title: I couldn't use my chroma skin in teambuilder?
body: I was gonna try a game of fizz top with the red chroma skin and it wouldn't show even tho I picked it already?

replies.body:
Hiya, Chespin2013! (Great Pokemon choice btw haha.)

Do you remember anymore details about the game when this happened? Like did you do Solo or Partied Team Builder? Did you manage to load in as the Fizz Scorch Red chroma successfully before?
yea I used the red Fizz one and I just joined in as a solo for TB and no I never used any chroma before I just bought it like a hour or so before I played the game
The same issue is happening with me but idk how to get it fixed. The skins were loading out just fine in patch 5.2 but idk what happened.
